column6: REALM OF KINGS. What's growing in Moondragon's belly, why is the Universal Church of Truth obsessed with keeping her, and can the Guardians rescue her before the planet they're on goes supernova?
column8: | writer:Dan Abnett | writer:Andy Lanning | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Alex Garner | colorist:Jay David Ramos | inker:Victor Olazaba | penciller:Brad Walker
